verses.verse: לְמוֹאָ֡ב <WH4124> Against Moab כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֩ <WH559> thus saith יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel ה֤וֹי <WH1945> Woe אֶל־ <WH413> to נְבוֹ֙ <WH5015> unto Nebo כִּ֣י <WH3588> for שֻׁדָּ֔דָה <WH7703> for it is spoiled הֹבִ֥ישָׁה <WH3001> is confounded נִלְכְּדָ֖ה <WH3920> [and] taken קִרְיָתָ֑יִם <WH7156> Kiriathaim הֹבִ֥ישָׁה <WH3001> is confounded הַמִּשְׂגָּ֖ב <WH4869> Misgab וָחָֽתָּה׃ <WH2865> and dismayed

אֵ֣ין <WH369> There עוֹד֮ <WH5750> longer תְּהִלַּ֣ת <WH8416> [There shall be] no more praise מוֹאָב֒ <WH4124> of Moab בְּחֶשְׁבּ֗וֹן <WH2809> in Heshbon חָשְׁב֤וּ <WH2803> they have devised עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5921> against רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> evil לְכ֖וּ <WH1980> her Come וְנַכְרִיתֶ֣נָּה <WH3772> and let us cut it off מִגּ֑וֹי <WH1471> from [being] a nation גַּם־ <WH1571> again מַדְמֵ֣ן <WH4086> O Madmen תִּדֹּ֔מִּי <WH1826> Also thou shalt be cut down אַחֲרַ֖יִךְ <WH310> thee תֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> her Come חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> the sword
ק֥וֹל <WH6963> A voice צְעָקָ֖ה <WH6818> of crying מֵחֹֽרוֹנָ֑יִם <WH2773> [shall be] from Horonaim שֹׁ֖ד <WH7701> spoiling וָשֶׁ֥בֶר <WH7667> destruction גָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> and great
נִשְׁבְּרָ֖ה <WH7665> is destroyed מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> Moab הִשְׁמִ֥יעוּ <WH8085> to be heard זְּעָקָ֖ה <WH2201> have caused a cry [צְעֹורֶיהָ כ] (צְעִירֶֽיהָ׃ <WH6810> least ק)

כִּ֚י <WH3588> by מַעֲלֵ֣ה <WH4608> For in the going up [הַלֻּחֹות כ] (הַלּוּחִ֔ית <WH3872> Luhith ק) בִּבְכִ֖י <WH1065> continual יַֽעֲלֶה־ <WH5927> shall go up בֶּ֑כִי <WH1065> weeping כִּ֚י <WH3588> at בְּמוֹרַ֣ד <WH4174> for in the going down חוֹרֹנַ֔יִם <WH2773> of Horonaim צָרֵ֥י <WH6862> the enemies צַֽעֲקַת־ <WH6818> a cry שֶׁ֖בֶר <WH7667> of destruction שָׁמֵֽעוּ׃ <WH8085> have heard
נֻ֖סוּ <WH5127> Flee מַלְּט֣וּ <WH4422> save נַפְשְׁכֶ֑ם <WH5315> your lives וְתִֽהְיֶ֕ינָה <WH1961> and be כַּעֲרוֹעֵ֖ר <WH6176> like the heath בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> in the wilderness

כִּ֠י <WH3588> For יַ֣עַן <WH3282> because בִּטְחֵ֤ךְ <WH982> For because thou hast trusted בְּמַעֲשַׂ֙יִךְ֙ <WH4639> in thy works וּבְא֣וֹצְרוֹתַ֔יִךְ <WH214> and in thy treasures גַּם־ <WH1571> Even אַ֖תְּ <WH859> you תִּלָּכֵ֑דִי <WH3920> thou shalt also be taken וְיָצָ֤א <WH3318> shall go forth [כְמִישׁ כ] (כְמֹושׁ֙ <WH3645> Chemosh ק) בַּגּוֹלָ֔ה <WH1473> into captivity כֹּהֲנָ֥יו <WH3548> [with] his priests וְשָׂרָ֖יו <WH8269> and his princes [יַחַד כ] (יַחְדָּֽיו׃ <WH3162> alike ק)

וְיָבֹ֨א <WH935> shall come שֹׁדֵ֜ד <WH7703> And the spoiler אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> every עִ֗יר <WH5892> upon every city וְעִיר֙ <WH5892> and no city לֹ֣א <WH3808> no תִמָּלֵ֔ט <WH4422> shall escape וְאָבַ֥ד <WH6> also shall perish הָעֵ֖מֶק <WH6010> the valley וְנִשְׁמַ֣ד <WH8045> shall be destroyed הַמִּישֹׁ֑ר <WH4334> and the plain אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after אָמַ֥ר <WH559> hath spoken יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> as the LORD

תְּנוּ־ <WH5414> Give צִ֣יץ <WH6731> wings לְמוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> unto Moab כִּ֥י <WH3588> that it נָצֹ֖א <WH5323> that it may flee תֵּצֵ֑א <WH3318> and get away וְעָרֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5892> for the cities לְשַׁמָּ֣ה <WH8047> thereof shall be desolate תִֽהְיֶ֔ינָה <WH1961> will become מֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> Without יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> without any to dwell בָּהֵֽן׃ <WH2004> therein

אָר֗וּר <WH779> Cursed עֹשֶׂ֛ה <WH6213> [be] he that doeth מְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> the work יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD רְמִיָּ֑ה <WH7423> deceitfully וְאָר֕וּר <WH779> and cursed מֹנֵ֥עַ <WH4513> [be] he that keepeth back חַרְבּ֖וֹ <WH2719> his sword מִדָּֽם׃ <WH1818> from blood

שַׁאֲנַ֨ן <WH7599> hath been at ease מוֹאָ֜ב <WH4124> Moab מִנְּעוּרָ֗יו <WH5271> from his youth וְשֹׁקֵ֥ט <WH8252> and he hath settled הוּא֙ <WH1931> he אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁמָרָ֔יו <WH8105> on his lees וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor הוּרַ֤ק <WH7324> and hath not been emptied מִכְּלִי֙ <WH3627> from vessel אֶל־ <WH413> to כֶּ֔לִי <WH3627> to vessel וּבַגּוֹלָ֖ה <WH1473> into captivity לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor הָלָ֑ךְ <WH1980> neither hath he gone עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that עָמַ֤ד <WH5975> remained טַעְמוֹ֙ <WH2940> therefore his taste בּ֔וֹ וְרֵיח֖וֹ <WH7381> in him and his scent לֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor נָמָֽר׃ <WH4171> is not changed ס

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore הִנֵּ֖ה־ <WH2009> behold יָמִ֤ים <WH3117> Therefore behold the days בָּאִים֙ <WH935> come נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְשִׁלַּחְתִּי־ <WH7971> that I will send ל֥וֹ צֹעִ֖ים <WH6808> unto him wanderers וְצֵעֻ֑הוּ <WH6808> that shall cause him to wander וְכֵלָ֣יו <WH3627> his vessels יָרִ֔יקוּ <WH7324> and shall empty וְנִבְלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5035> their bottles יְנַפֵּֽצוּ׃ <WH5310> and break

וּבֹ֥שׁ <WH954> shall be ashamed מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> And Moab מִכְּמ֑וֹשׁ <WH3645> of Chemosh כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בֹּ֙שׁוּ֙ <WH954> was ashamed בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> as the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel מִבֵּ֥ית אֵ֖ל <WH1008> of Bethel מִבְטֶחָֽם׃ <WH4009> their confidence
אֵ֚יךְ <WH349> How תֹּֽאמְר֔וּ <WH559> How say גִּבּוֹרִ֖ים <WH1368> ye We [are] mighty אֲנָ֑חְנוּ <WH587> we וְאַנְשֵׁי־ <WH582> men חַ֖יִל <WH2428> and strong לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> battle

שֻׁדַּ֤ד <WH7703> is spoiled מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> Moab וְעָרֶ֣יהָ <WH5892> [out of] her cities עָלָ֔ה <WH5927> and gone up וּמִבְחַ֥ר <WH4005> and his chosen בַּֽחוּרָ֖יו <WH970> young men יָרְד֣וּ <WH3381> are gone down לַטָּ֑בַח <WH2875> Tebah נְאֻ֨ם־ <WH5002> saith הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the King יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [is] the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> whose name
קָר֥וֹב <WH7138> [is] near אֵיד־ <WH343> The calamity מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> of Moab לָב֑וֹא <WH935> to come וְרָ֣עָת֔וֹ <WH7451> and his affliction מִהֲרָ֖ה <WH4116> hasteth מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> fast

נֻ֤דוּ <WH5110> him bemoan לוֹ֙ כָּל־ <WH3605> all סְבִיבָ֔יו <WH5439> All ye that are about וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all יֹדְעֵ֣י <WH3045> him and all ye that know שְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> his name אִמְר֗וּ <WH559> say אֵיכָ֤ה <WH349> how נִשְׁבַּר֙ <WH7665> broken מַטֵּה־ <WH4294> staff עֹ֔ז <WH5797> How is the strong מַקֵּ֖ל <WH4731> rod תִּפְאָרָֽה׃ <WH8597> [and] the beautiful

רְדִ֤י <WH3381> come down מִכָּבוֹד֙ <WH3519> from [thy] glory [יֹשְׁבֶי כ] (וּשְׁבִ֣י <WH3427> and sit ק) בַצָּמָ֔א <WH6772> in thirst יֹשֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> that dost inhabit בַּת־ <WH1323> Thou daughter דִּיב֑וֹן <WH1769> Dibon כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For שֹׁדֵ֤ד <WH7703> for the spoiler מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> of Moab עָ֣לָה <WH5927> shall come בָ֔ךְ שִׁחֵ֖ת <WH7843> upon thee [and] he shall destroy מִבְצָרָֽיִךְ׃ <WH4013> thy strong holds

אֶל־ <WH413> by דֶּ֛רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way עִמְדִ֥י <WH5975> stand וְצַפִּ֖י <WH6822> and espy יוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> O inhabitant עֲרוֹעֵ֑ר <WH6177> of Aroer שַׁאֲלִי־ <WH7592> ask נָ֣ס <WH5127> him that fleeth וְנִמְלָ֔טָה <WH4422> and her that escapeth אִמְרִ֖י <WH559> [and] say מַה־ <WH4100> What נִּֽהְיָֽתָה׃ <WH1961> What is done

הֹבִ֥ישׁ <WH3001> is confounded מוֹאָ֛ב <WH4124> Moab כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for חַ֖תָּה <WH2865> for it is broken down [הֵילִילִי כ] (הֵילִ֣ילוּ <WH3213> howl ק) [וּזְעָקִי כ] (וּֽזְעָ֑קוּ <WH2199> assemble ק) הַגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> tell בְאַרְנ֔וֹן <WH769> ye it in Arnon כִּ֥י <WH3588> for שֻׁדַּ֖ד <WH7703> is spoiled מוֹאָֽב׃ <WH4124> that Moab

וּמִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> And judgment בָּ֖א <WH935> is come אֶל־ <WH413> about אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> country הַמִּישֹׁ֑ר <WH4334> upon the plain אֶל־ <WH413> upon חֹל֥וֹן <WH2473> upon Holon וְאֶל־ <WH413> about יַ֖הְצָה <WH3096> and upon Jahazah וְעַל־ <WH5921> and against [מֹופָעַת כ] (מֵיפָֽעַת׃ <WH4158> Mephaath ק)
וְעַל־ <WH5921> against דִּיב֣וֹן <WH1769> And upon Dibon וְעַל־ <WH5921> against נְב֔וֹ <WH5015> and upon Nebo וְעַל־ <WH5921> against בֵּ֖ית דִּבְלָתָֽיִם׃ <WH1015> and upon Bethdiblathaim

וְעַ֧ל <WH5921> against קִרְיָתַ֛יִם <WH7156> And upon Kiriathaim וְעַל־ <WH5921> against בֵּ֥ית גָּמ֖וּל <WH1014> and upon Bethgamul וְעַל־ <WH5921> against בֵּ֥ית מְעֽוֹן׃ <WH1010> and upon Bethmeon

וְעַל־ <WH5921> against קְרִיּ֖וֹת <WH7152> And upon Kerioth וְעַל־ <WH5921> against בָּצְרָ֑ה <WH1224> and upon Bozrah וְעַ֗ל <WH5921> against כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עָרֵי֙ <WH5892> and upon all the cities אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab הָרְחֹק֖וֹת <WH7350> far וְהַקְּרֹבֽוֹת׃ <WH7138> or near
נִגְדְּעָה֙ <WH1438> is cut off קֶ֣רֶן <WH7161> The horn מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab וּזְרֹע֖וֹ <WH2220> and his arm נִשְׁבָּ֑רָה <WH7665> is broken נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

הַשְׁכִּירֻ֕הוּ <WH7937> Make ye him drunken כִּ֥י <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> toward יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> [himself] against the LORD הִגְדִּ֑יל <WH1431> for he magnified וְסָפַ֤ק <WH5606> also shall wallow מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> Moab בְּקִיא֔וֹ <WH6892> in his vomit וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> will become לִשְׂחֹ֖ק <WH7814> and he also shall be in derision גַּם־ <WH1571> also הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> to you

וְאִ֣ם ׀ <WH518> Or ל֣וֹא <WH3808> not הַשְּׂחֹ֗ק <WH7814> a derision הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become לְךָ֙ יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> For was not Israel אִם־ <WH518> Or בְּגַנָּבִ֖ים <WH1767> time [נִמְצָאָה כ] (נִמְצָ֑א <WH4672> be able ק) כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מִדֵּ֧י <WH1767> time דְבָרֶ֥יךָ <WH1697> thou spakest בּ֖וֹ תִּתְנוֹדָֽד׃ <WH5110> of him thou skippedst

עִזְב֤וּ <WH5800> leave עָרִים֙ <WH5892> the cities וְשִׁכְנ֣וּ <WH7931> and dwell בַּסֶּ֔לַע <WH5553> in the rock יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> O ye that dwell מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> in Moab וִֽהְי֣וּ <WH1961> and be like כְיוֹנָ֔ה <WH3123> and be like the dove תְּקַנֵּ֖ן <WH7077> [that] maketh her nest בְּעֶבְרֵ֥י <WH5676> in the sides פִי־ <WH6310> mouth פָֽחַת׃ <WH6354> of the hole's

שָׁמַ֥עְנוּ <WH8085> We have heard גְאוֹן־ <WH1347> the pride מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> of Moab גֵּאֶ֣ה <WH1343> proud מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> (he is exceeding גָּבְה֧וֹ <WH1363> excellency וּגְאוֹנ֛וֹ <WH1347> and his pride וְגַאֲוָת֖וֹ <WH1346> and his arrogancy וְרֻ֥ם <WH7312> and the haughtiness לִבּֽוֹ׃ <WH3820> of his heart

אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I יָדַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH3045> I know נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD עֶבְרָת֖וֹ <WH5678> his wrath וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nothing כֵ֑ן <WH3651> after that בַּדָּ֖יו <WH907> but [it shall] not [be] so his lies לֹא־ <WH3808> nothing כֵ֥ן <WH3651> after that עָשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> shall not so effect

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> after that עַל־ <WH5921> for מוֹאָ֣ב <WH4124> for Moab אֲיֵלִ֔יל <WH3213> Therefore will I howl וּלְמוֹאָ֥ב <WH4124> for all Moab כֻּלֹּ֖ה <WH3605> for all אֶזְעָ֑ק <WH2199> and I will cry out אֶל־ <WH413> for אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> the men קִֽיר־ חֶ֖רֶשׂ <WH7025> of Kirheres יֶהְגֶּֽה׃ <WH1897> [mine heart] shall mourn

מִבְּכִ֨י <WH1065> for thee with the weeping יַעְזֵ֤ר <WH3270> of Jazer אֶבְכֶּה־ <WH1058> I will weep לָּךְ֙ הַגֶּ֣פֶן <WH1612> O vine שִׂבְמָ֔ה <WH7643> of Sibmah נְטִֽישֹׁתַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5189> thy plants עָ֣בְרוּ <WH5674> are gone over יָ֔ם <WH3220> the sea עַ֛ד <WH5704> against יָ֥ם <WH3220> [even] to the sea יַעְזֵ֖ר <WH3270> of Jazer נָגָ֑עוּ <WH5060> they reach עַל־ <WH5921> upon קֵיצֵ֥ךְ <WH7019> upon thy summer fruits וְעַל־ <WH5921> and בְּצִירֵ֖ךְ <WH1210> and upon thy vintage שֹׁדֵ֥ד <WH7703> the spoiler נָפָֽל׃ <WH5307> is fallen

וְנֶאֶסְפָ֨ה <WH622> is taken שִׂמְחָ֥ה <WH8057> And joy וָגִ֛יל <WH1524> and gladness מִכַּרְמֶ֖ל <WH3759> from the plentiful field וּמֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> and from the land מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> of Moab וְיַ֙יִן֙ <WH3196> and I have caused wine מִיקָבִ֣ים <WH3342> from the winepresses הִשְׁבַּ֔תִּי <WH7673> to fail לֹֽא־ <WH3808> No יִדְרֹ֣ךְ <WH1869> none shall tread הֵידָ֔ד <WH1959> with shouting הֵידָ֖ד <WH1959> [their] shouting לֹ֥א <WH3808> No הֵידָֽד׃ <WH1959> [shall be] no shouting

וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֥י <WH7673> Moreover I will cause to cease לְמוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> in Moab נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD מַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> him that offereth בָמָ֔ה <WH1116> in the high places וּמַקְטִ֖יר <WH6999> and him that burneth incense לֵאלֹהָֽיו׃ <WH430> to his gods
